name: Clean Revolution Liquid Gel Hand Sanitizer, 128 Fl. Oz Refill Supply Container| Eliminates 99.9% of Germs | Gentle & Aloe Enriched | 70% USP Medical Grade Ethanol, Medical Facility Compliant
short_description: FAST AND EFFECTIVELY ELIMINATE 99.9% of GERMS ON HANDS: Made with 70% USP medical grade ethanol, which meets the high purity and quality standard for use in pharmaceutical applications and medical facilities.
MOISTURIZE AND SOFTEN YOUR SKIN: Made with Aloe Vera & Vitamin E to keep your hands from drying out due to repeated use, leaves skin feeling clean, soft and refreshed
GET MORE WITH REFILL GALLONS: Each gallon refills over 10 twelve ounce dispensers, (sold separately); Eliminating individual single-use plastic bottles and creating less waste in landfills

CONTAINS 70% USP MEDICAL GRADE ETHANOL: USP Ethanol meets the highest quality standards for medical use. Regular ethanol, used in cheaper disinfectants and santiizers, may contain impurities that are harmful to human health.

NO ANIMAL TESTING: Clean Revolution uses the latest advances in Green Chemistry to create high quality products that are never tested on animals nor made with animal-derived ingredients. Packaging is 100% recyclable
product_description: Join the Clean Revolution, we believe in less waste and more clean. 35 billion plastic bottles are thrown away each year in the US. Our goal is to encourage reuse with innovative reusable and refillable products that deliver greater value than disposabe products. Our products are proudly made in the USA and made with trusted ingredients using the latest advances in Green Chemistry. We never test products on animals nor use any animal-derived ingredients which means you can have peace of mind for your family, pets and the planet.

short_description: ✅ Advanced Germ Protection with 70% Alcohol – Our hand sanitizer gel contains 70% ethyl alcohol to effectively kill 99.99% of germs and bacteria. The no-rinse, fast-acting formula keeps your hands clean and protected wherever you go, without needing water or soap.

✅ Moisturizing Formula for Daily Use – Designed to be gentle on skin, this sanitizer helps keep your hands soft and smooth even after frequent use. Ideal for sensitive or dry skin types, it's perfect for homes, classrooms, healthcare offices, and businesses.

✅ Non-Sticky, Quick-Dry Clear Gel – The crystal-clear hand sanitizer spreads easily and dries fast without leaving behind any sticky or greasy residue. It's a no-drip solution that provides a clean, refreshed feeling after each application—no mess, no fuss.

✅ 1 Gallon Size with Easy-to-Use Pump – Comes in a large 1-gallon refillable bottle with a built-in pump for convenient dispensing. Great for refilling smaller bottles and sanitizing stations in high-traffic areas like schools, clinics, stores, and offices.

✅ Bulk Value for Commercial & Personal Use – This bulk hand sanitizer is ideal for families, workplaces, retail counters, gyms, warehouses, and other public spaces. Keep everyone safe and stocked with this cost-effective solution for hand hygiene.
product_description: Stay clean and protected with our Hand Sanitizer Gel 1 Gallon with Pump, crafted for effective sanitizing and comfort. With 70% alcohol, this powerful, no-rinse gel kills 99.99% of germs—no water or towel needed. Its quick-drying, non-sticky formula keeps hands clean without leaving behind any residue. Gentle enough for everyday use, the formula is moisturizing and suitable for all skin types, making it a perfect fit for families, employees, teachers, and customers alike. The refillable 1-gallon bottle includes a user-friendly pump for mess-free application and easy dispensing into smaller containers. Ideal for homes, offices, schools, clinics, and commercial spaces, this bulk hand sanitizer ensures reliable hygiene wherever it’s needed most. Stock up and stay protected with a convenient and cost-effective sanitizing solution.

PURELL hand sanitizer is formulated to be gentle on skin with four conditioners and is clinically proven to maintain skin health. It is free of harsh preservatives, and does not contain dye, triclosan, parabens, or phthalates. Place this travel-sized 1 fl oz bottle in your purse, gym bag, or diaper bag. Reach for the PURELL bottle when you need to kill germs, refresh, or clean-up in a hurry. PURELL hand sanitizer is free of triclosan and will not create supergerms, as the alcohol formulation kills germs and evaporates quickly, so germs don’t become resistant.
